dct_description_sm:
Five engraved vignettes are seen, an Arab family of Algeria, Bosjeman Hottentots, a view
        of St. Helena, a Bedouin Arabs' encampment and Korranna Hottentots. "The illustrations were
        drawn by J. Marchant and engraved by J.H. Kernot. The map was drawn and engraved by J.
        Rapkin"; Prime meridian through Greenwich.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Dr. Oscar I. Norwich collection of maps of Africa and its islands, 1486 - ca. 1865 courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
